about_the_game:
I am a book of mazes. There are no entrances in halls of my pages, the history of world creation sleeps here. Do you remember that history? Then show me the way!

Mazes of this first-person adventure game are full of hazards and random loot which can help you in journey or show you pieces of story, the story you are already part of.

Features:
- generated labyrinths, weapons and cardboard enemies;
- book paintings world style;
- search for collectibles that are based on history and memes of gamedev.

Full version:
- storytale;
- persistent weapon upgrades;
- bossfights;
- traps.

name: Show me the way

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Pentium 440m
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 730
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i3-3220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
